title: 3 members of Congress make a rare visit to opposition-held northwest Syria
description: It's the first known visit to the country by American lawmakers in six years. GOP Reps. French Hill, Ben Cline and Scott Fitzgerald urged the Biden administration to maintain pressure on Bashar Assad.

title: Tropical Storm Idalia could reach hurricane strength before hitting Florida this week
description: Forecasters say the storm is expected to intensify as it moves north over the Gulf of Mexico, but it's still unclear how strong it will be and what path it will take.

title: COMIC: In the '90s I survived summers in Egypt with no AC. How would it feel now?
description: In elementary school, NPR's Malaka Gharib visited her dad in Cairo each summer. It was hot, there was no AC — but she coped. In this age of global warming, she wonders: How are Egyptians getting by?

title: Russia says it has confirmed Yevgeny Prigozhin died in last week's plane crash
description: Russia's Investigative Committee has said it has confirmed that Yevgeny Prigozhin, founder and head of the mercenary force Wagner, who led a short-lived armed rebellion, was killed in a plane crash.

title: Love, war and loss: How one soldier in Ukraine hopes to be made whole again
description: An artillery shell should have killed Andrii Smolenskyi in May. Instead, the blast tore off both of his arms above the elbow and destroyed his eyes. Now he's fighting to put his life back together.

title: A groundbreaking exhibition on the National Mall shows monuments aren't set in stone
description: The first official outdoor exhibition on Washington D.C.'s National Mall showcases six artists whose monuments honor American stories missing from the heart of the country's capitol.

title: Minnesota returns voting power to thousands. The question is whether they'll use it
description: A new law in Minnesota speeds up restoration of voting eligibility to the formerly incarcerated. Now advocates are fanning out to convince people to use those rights.

title: Several injured, 1 critically, in a US military aircraft crash in Australia
description: Three United States military personnel were taken to a hospital, one with critical injuries, after a U.S. aircraft crashed on a north Australian island Sunday during a  military exercise.

title: Zimbabwe's electoral commission says President Mnangagwa has won a second term
description: Zimbabwean President Emmerson Mnangagwa was re-elected for a second and final five-year term on Saturday, in results announced much earlier than expected in another troubled vote in the country.

title: Thousands march to mark the 60th anniversary of MLK's 'I Have a Dream' speech
description: Decades after the 1963 March on Washington, thousands again gathered in the nation's capital to declare that Martin Luther King Jr.'s legacy was in jeopardy amid fresh civil rights struggles.
